data.title: Edward Kennedy Worship Album Fundraiser by Edward James Kennedy — Kickstarter
data.name: Edward James Kennedy
data.description: Raising money to start recording an acoustic praise and worship album.

data.title: Rooted and Built Up in Him : Songs from Colossians by AugustGateMusic — Kickstarter
data.name: AugustGateMusic
data.description: A collection of songs written by songwriters and musicians of August Gate Church based on Paul's letter to the Colossians.

data.title: Break Heaven Open by Colin Geoffrey Edge — Kickstarter
data.name: Colin Geoffrey Edge
data.description: “Break Heaven Open” will be our first worship album together. We’d be honored for you to be a part of it.

data.title: Drop by Drop: New Jewish Music! by Stephen Brickman — Kickstarter
data.name: Stephen Brickman
data.description: Drop by Drop is an EP of thought-provoking and spiritually engaging Jewish Music from Stephen Brickman and the Sing-Together Project
